definition: Guo Xiaochuan (1919-1976), PRC communist poet, hero in the war with Japan, died after long persecution during Cultural Revolution
outer city wall
surname Guo
small/tiny/few/young
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
river/creek/plain/an area of level country

sentences.english: The birth of new China ushered the new era of Guo Xiao-chuan's life and creation.
sentences.chinese: 新中国的诞生，开辟了郭小川生活与创作的新时代。
